title.rendered: Sessionwire Launches Version 3 of their Remote Music Collaboration Platform

content.rendered:
Sessionwire, at home in any studio

Sessionwire Launches Version 3 of their Remote Music Collaboration Platform

This is the tool we’ve imagined for so long. We listened to our community and our team has delivered! It really has solved some of our industry’s most difficult challenges.”

— Colin Wiebe – CEO Sessionwire.com

VANCOUVER, BC, CANADA, April 13, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — Sessionwire has announced the launch of its all-new Sessionwire platform, a cutting-edge online platform for live remote music collaboration. With the latest release, the company has eliminated their previous downloadable app and opted for a browser-based platform.

Content creators and producers can now invite anyone to a session by sending a reusable link to their personal online studio, making it easier to work remotely in real-time with their clients.

Sessionwire features high-quality voice and video, separate HQ Audio and Talkback channels with level controls and meters for each participant, drag and drop file sharing, Sessionchat a Slack-style messaging system, and macOS and Windows plugins in AU, AAX, and VST3 formats for DAWs like Pro Tools, Ableton, StudioOne, and Logic Pro X.

Rich Keller, who has worked with artists such as DMX, Alicia Keys, Lil Wayne, Mariah Carey, and Snoop Dogg, says “With Sessionwire Studio, I can have direct contact with my artist. When I use picture in picture and I’m sharing my screen, I can see their face on my screen as I’m working. That’s worth everything to me because I can get instant feedback by watching their facial expressions while I’m mixing.”

Sessionwire Studio is the perfect platform for content creators looking to get up close and personal with their clients and collaborate remotely in real-time.

For more information, visit Sessionwire’s website.

Colin Wiebe
Fast Creative Inc
+1 604-219-6425
email us here
Visit us on social media:
Facebook
Twitter
Instagram
YouTube

Introducing Sessionwire Studio

You just read:

News Provided By

April 14, 2023, 06:58 GMT
